% ---------------------------------------------------------
%     DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE - ALL CHANGES WILL BE LOST    
%
% This is the top-level file for PDG review ml. It
% is automatically generated and updated based on the PDG
% database and using the latest PDG LaTeX templates.
%
% Please edit the file ml-main.tex to update your
% review.
% ---------------------------------------------------------
\documentclass{pdg}

% Data extracted from the PDG database
%
% NOTE: - \ischaptertrue or \ischapterfalse determine whether chapter is numbered or not
%       - \sectiontitle set to non-blank value indicates a subreview (or subsubreview)
%       - \subsectiontitle set to non-blank value indicates a subsubreview
%
\reviewtitle{Machine Learning}
\reviewauthor{K. Cranmer (NYU), U. Seljak (UC Berkeley; LBNL) and K. Terao (SLAC)}
\reviewlabel{ml}
\setcounter{chapter}{40}
\ischaptertrue

% Set the bleeder section
\setcounter{bleedersection}{6}

% Include review (and if applicable, subreview) preamble files
\input{ml-preamble}

% Always make index (previously done only in draft mode)
\usepackage{makeidx}
\makeindex

\ifdefined\isbooklet
\externalcitedocument{ml-full}
\externaldocument{ml-full}
\fi

\IfFileExists{crossref.aux}{\externaldocument{crossref}}{}

% Start document, add top-level review title (and possibly section) for subreviews
\begin{document}

% Set starting page number for book and booklet
\ifdefined\isbook
\setcounter{page}{642}
\fi
\ifdefined\isbooklet
\setcounter{page}{245}
\fi

% Enable bleeder tabs in book mode
\ifdefined\isbook
\rppthumb
\fi


% Include -main or -booklet file, depending on what we're making
\ifdefined\isbooklet
\fontsize{8pt}{9pt}\selectfont
\input{ml-booklet}
\else
\begin{bibunit}
\input{ml-main}
\end{bibunit}
\fi

% Generate index for draft mode
\ifdefined\isdraft
\clearpage
\printindex
\fi

\end{document}
